archimate:Requirement.name: SC.2.2.5c: c) employing a data leakage prevention (DLP) solution by extending an on-premises DLP programme to cloud services, configuring DLP functionality in cloud services and/or using the DLP functionality of a cloud access security broker (CASB).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
